dmca.title: counterfeiting: www.sabetudo.net
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: hiltonjr@galgrin.com [mailto:hiltonjr@galgrin.com] 
Sent: Monday, February 14, 2005 5:25 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: counterfeiting: www.sabetudo.net

Dear Mr.,

I'd like to inform you that the website www.sabetudo.net , hosted
by you, is infringing international copyright law counterfeiting
the original e-books, that are sold by our company in the
websites www.seducaomagnetica.com.br and www.percagordura.com.br

The counterfeiting e-books have been sold in the url
http://www.sabetudo.net/Seducao/4Livros.html and
http://sabetudo.net/guia1.htm. I notified the previows ISP, and
they closed the sabetudo.net's account. Due to this the owner of
sabetudo.net migrated the website to your servers.

I'd like to ask your cooperation because we've tried to contact
the owner several times but there's no response.


Thanks,
Hilton J
